text: Jorge Lopes Bom Jesus (born 26 July 1962), also known as JBJ, is a politician from São Tomé. He became the 17th Prime Minister of São Tomé and Príncipe on 3 December 2018. He is a member of the Movement for the Liberation of São Tomé and Príncipe/Social Democratic Party (MLSTP-PSD). ==References== Category:Prime Ministers of São Tomé and Príncipe Category:Living people Category:1962 births
title: Jorge Bom Jesus
